sentences.english: Where are Chinese gooseberries most massively planted?
sentences.chinese: 種植中國獼猴桃最多的國家是哪一個？

sentences.english: Cangxi Red kiwifruit industry has a bright prospect.
sentences.chinese: 蒼溪紅心獼猴桃產業前景廣闊。

sentences.english: Cangxi Red Kiwi is safe and healthy.
sentences.chinese: 蒼溪紅心獼猴桃是安全健康食品。

sentences.english: Jag har en kiwi och en melon.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個獼猴桃和一個甜瓜。

sentences.english: Other excellent sources of C include kiwifruit, broccoli, and of course oranges.
sentences.chinese: 其他富含維生素C食品包括獼猴桃，花椰菜和橙子。

sentences.english: In Asia, the hardy kiwi grows well in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 在亞洲，獼猴桃在廕庇條件下能生長得很好。

sentences.english: Cangxi is one of the earliest areas to cultivate kiwifruit.
sentences.chinese: 蒼溪是中國人工栽培獼猴桃最早的地區之一。

sentences.english: A method was developed for the quantitative analysis of organic acids in Actinidia chinensis by GC.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用氣相色譜定量分析了獼猴桃中有機酸含量。

sentences.english: Mowing the lawn on a kiwi.
Kiwis are loaded with vitamin C and antioxidants that help keep hair firm and healthy.
sentences.chinese: 獼猴桃富含維他命C和抗氧化劑，讓頭髮堅硬且健康。

sentences.english: Actinidia is a precious orchard resource in China.
sentences.chinese: 獼猴桃是我國特有的珍貴果樹資源。

sentences.english: Just lie bananas, kiwis contain a lot of potassium.
sentences.chinese: 就像香蕉一樣，獼猴桃還有大量的鉀元素。

sentences.english: The optimal conditions of polyphenols extraction from kiwifruit were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究提取獼猴桃中多酚的最佳工藝條件。

sentences.english: Fruits like oranges and kiwis have lots of vitamin C.
sentences.chinese: 有些水果，譬如橙子和獼猴桃，含豐富的維生素。

sentences.english: Using these methods we got very clear AFLP pattern in the AFLP study of sex identification in Actinidia.
sentences.chinese: 應用這些方法得到了獼猴桃清晰的AFLP指紋圖譜。

sentences.english: Want an even easier way to eat a kiwi?
sentences.chinese: 想要更方便地喫獼猴桃嗎？

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
Yangmei town in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
red bayberry/Chinese bayberry/Japanese bayberry/Myrica rubra/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
food preserved in sugar or honey
